articles.description: The Queen, 95, was due to visit the Halcyon Days factory in Staffordshire in 2020 to mark its own Platinum Jubilee of 70 years, but plans were put on hold when the pandemic struck.
articles.content: The Queen was all smiles as she stood with her walking stick at an official engagement at her Windsor Castle home this week after it was revealed she hopes to attend a thanksgiving service to remembe… [+13050 chars]

articles.author: Susan Knox
articles.title: Chris Evans gets emotional as he discovers Rod Stewart's efforts to help Ukrainians - The Mirror
articles.description: Radio host Chris Evans was left gobsmacked after discovering that Sir Rod Stewart was 'secretly' helping Ukrainian refugees find a way out of their country amid the ongoing war
articles.content:
Chris Evans has been left in disbelief over Rod Stewart's efforts to help fund Ukrainians who are seeking refuge in the UK amid Russia's invasion.

articles.title: Placebo – 'Never Let Me Go' review: a renaissance rock record with an experimental edge - NME
articles.description: The British veterans' first album in almost a decade isn't quite the ‘Metal Machine Music’ they suggest, but it is their best since ‘Meds’
articles.content: Brian Molko recently told NME that the band craved a new direction after a gruelling ’20 Years of Placebo‘ greatest hits tour that dragged them across the globe between 2016 and 2018. After playing y… [+2213 chars]
